content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 we modified our *chevron colour-block blanket* to create this simple and modern baby blanket using blue sky alpacas worsted cotton this cheerful two-row pattern is easy to customize in terms of size with the addition of 24-stitch repeats use our suggested girl / boy colour palettes or be creative this pattern is now available in danish 2 2 https //strikkeglad dk/14701/chevron-taeppe-og-babytaeppe/
